title: ANANYA Deluxe Suite
description:
The spacious living area features a cozy double bed, a comfortable couch, satellite TV, telephone, safe, minibar, desk, kettle set, hot water bottle, and a digital guest folder with all the important information for your stay.
The bathroom is equipped with a shower, toilet, bidet, washbasin, hairdryer, cosmetic mirror, soap/shampoo, cosmetic tissues, bathrobe, and slippers â€“ for a thoroughly relaxing and well-cared-for experience.
A parking space directly in front of the hotel is included in the price.
